=Installation instructions=

==Configuration==

In this instruction <MULE_HOME> refers to the place where Mule is installed.

To change the default settings for TakeCare crm:scheduling service bridge put a file with name _TakeCareIntegrationComponent-config-override.properties_ in the classpath (<MULE_HOME>/conf).
